Conference Schedule (7 Jun 2019 at NUS School of Computing)

0830 - 0900 Registration & Breakfast
0900 - 0915 Opening & Entertainment
0915 - 1100 Talks by BuildingBloCS alumni, Google, GovTech, Google Code-in Grand Prize Winner, PayPal and more!
1100 - 1300 Networking & Lunch & Games
1300 - 1600 Winpetition and/or Workshops
1600 - 1715 Talks & Projects Showcase (3-5 min) & Judging (concurrent)
1715 - 1730 Awards & Group Photo & Closing
